snippet.title: Deadly Arts G.A.S.P. Trailer 1998
snippet.description:
Deadly Arts G.A.S.P. Trailer 1998

Official Content From Konami

Fully customize playable characters ranging from, height, weight, strength and even hair-do while training your fighter and saving him to the controller pack. Choose between several interactive arenas with falling walls, massive fighting rings and changing backgrounds to test your creation on the field of battle.
Platforms: Nintendo 64

Nintendo 64
, Fighting,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Deadly Arts G.A.S.P.
